description: Creates an Amazon Chime SDK Voice Connector. For more information about Voice Connectors, see Managing Amazon Chime SDK Voice Connector groups in the Amazon Chime SDK Administrator Guide.

parameters.name: Name
parameters.description: The name of the Voice Connector.

parameters.name: RequireEncryption
parameters.description: Enables or disables encryption for the Voice Connector.

parameters.name: Tags
parameters.description: The tags assigned to the Voice Connector. (dict) --- Describes a tag applied to a resource. The tag's key. The tag's value.

parameters.name: IntegrationType
parameters.description: The connectors for use with Amazon Connect. The following options are available: CONNECT_CALL_TRANSFER_CONNECTOR - Enables enterprises to integrate Amazon Connect with other voice systems to directly transfer voice calls and metadata without using the public telephone network. They can use Amazon Connect telephony and Interactive Voice Response (IVR) with their existing voice systems to modernize the IVR experience of their existing contact center and their enterprise and branch voice systems. Additionally, enterprises migrating their contact center to Amazon Connect can start with Connect telephony and IVR for immediate modernization ahead of agent migration. CONNECT_ANALYTICS_CONNECTOR - Enables enterprises to integrate Amazon Connect with other voice systems for real-time and post-call analytics. They can use Amazon Connect Contact Lens with their existing voice systems to provides call recordings, conversational analytics (including contact transcript, sensitive data redaction, content categorization, theme detection, sentiment analysis, real-time alerts, and post-contact summary), and agent performance evaluations (including evaluation forms, automated evaluation, supervisor review) with a rich user experience to display, search and filter customer interactions, and programmatic access to data streams and the data lake. Additionally, enterprises migrating their contact center to Amazon Connect can start with Contact Lens analytics and performance insights ahead of agent migration.

nested_items.name: VoiceConnector
nested_items.description: The details of the Voice Connector.

nested_items.name: AwsRegion
nested_items.description: The AWS Region in which the Voice Connector is created. Default: us-east-1.

nested_items.name: OutboundHostName
nested_items.description: The outbound host name for the Voice Connector.

nested_items.name: RequireEncryption
nested_items.description: Enables or disables encryption for the Voice Connector.

nested_items.name: CreatedTimestamp
nested_items.description: The Voice Connector's creation timestamp, in ISO 8601 format.

nested_items.name: UpdatedTimestamp
nested_items.description: The Voice Connector's updated timestamp, in ISO 8601 format.

nested_items.name: VoiceConnectorArn
nested_items.description: The ARN of the Voice Connector.

nested_items.name: IntegrationType
nested_items.description: The connectors for use with Amazon Connect.
